show_name: Teki wa Kaizoku: Neko no Kyōen (OAV)
other_title: The Enemy Is the Pirate: Banquet of Cats
敵は海賊 ～猫たちの饗宴～ (Japanese)
plot: Apulo (a cat-like space alien with the ability to lock a human's emotions) and Latell work for the Division of Space Piracy (or DSP for short). The two of them are extremely destructive in their solving of DSP cases. They are attempting to stop Youmei the space pirate from exploiting Computer Aided Thinking for his own nefarious plans.
opening_theme: "Danger on the Street" by Air Pavilion
